Construct an afni_lm_spec object

Source: R/afni_lm.R
afni_lm_spec.Rd

Creates an `afni_lm_spec` object bundling the model, dataset, options, working directory, and generated 3dDeconvolve command.

Usage

afni_lm_spec(model, dataset, working_dir, options, cmd)

Arguments

model

An `fmri_model` used to generate the AFNI command

dataset

An `fmri_dataset` or NULL if using `nodata`

working_dir

Character path used when generating files

options

A named list of options passed to command generation

cmd

A list with `cmd` (string) and other command metadata

Value

An object of class `afni_lm_spec`

On this page
